title: Gigi Hadid is a dream in cream as the supermodel heads out in NYC with mom Yolanda
text:
She's a second generation supermodel.

And both Gigi Hadid and mother Yolanda Hadid were spotted heading out in Manhattan for a day of mother-daughter bonding on Tuesday.

Both the 55-year-old Hadid matriarch and her 24-year-old Vogue covergirl daughter wore white tops for the Fall outing.

Family outing: Gigi Hadid, 24, and mother Yolanda Hadid were spotted heading out in Manhattan for a day of mother-daughter bonding on Tuesday

Gigi -whose full name is Jelena Noura Hadid- paired her cream-colored turtleneck top with white sweatpants.

Her one concession to color were her pink socks which she wore with white sneakers.

The elder sister of Bella Hadid wore her dirty blonde tresses pulled back with a scrunchie into a pony tail.

Her RHOBH star mom meanwhile showed off her still-scintillating form in a pair of clingy blue jeans.

Still got it: RHOBH star Yolanda, 55, meanwhile showed off her still-scintillating form in a pair of clingy blue jeans

Gigi Hadid's outing comes after her apparent split with The Bachelorette star Tyler Cameron, following just a few months of dating.

Hadid and Cameron were first rumored to be romantically linked when they started following each other on Instagram in late July, and they were seen at Soho House in Brooklyn on August 4.

Hadid then brought Cameron to the Republic Records party following the MTV Video Music Awards in last August, where they were spotted kissing.

Moving on: Gigi Hadid's outing comes after her apparent split with The Bachelorette star Tyler Cameron, following just a few months of dating. Seen together in August

Cameron even attended the funeral of Hadid's grandmother, seen consoling her throughout the funeral which seemed to solidify their relationship status.

Still, shortly after the funeral, Cameron seemed to downplay their relationship.

'She’s an amazing person. We’ve had a great time together. We’ve hung out a few times. That’s all,' he said.
description: Gigi Hadid and mother Yolanda Hadid were spotted heading out in Manhattan for a day of mother-daughter bonding on Tuesday, while both clad in white.
